      • BASIC_FACTORY

        @Deprecated
public static final Factory BASIC_FACTORY
        Deprecated. 
        The Basic1DFactory singleton instance. Deprecated: use LinearAlgebra.DENSE_FACTORY instead.

      • COMPRESSED_FACTORY

        @Deprecated
public static final Factory COMPRESSED_FACTORY
        Deprecated. 
        The CRSFactory singleton instance. Deprecated: use LinearAlgebra.SPARSE_FACTORY instead.

      • SAFE_BASIC_FACTORY

        @Deprecated
public static final Factory SAFE_BASIC_FACTORY
        Deprecated. 
        Safe version of BASIC_FACTORY.

        The safe factory creates vectors that is wrapped with safe accessors and modifiers.

        Deprecated: use LinearAlgebra.SAFE_DENSE_FACTORY instead.

      • SAFE_COMPRESSED_FACTORY

        @Deprecated
public static final Factory SAFE_COMPRESSED_FACTORY
        Deprecated. 
        Safe version of COMPRESSED_FACTORY.

        The safe factory creates vectors that is wrapped with safe accessors and modifiers.

        Deprecated: use LinearAlgebra.SAFE_SPARSE_FACTORY instead.

      • UNSAFE_BASIC_FACTORY

        @Deprecated
public static final Factory UNSAFE_BASIC_FACTORY
        Deprecated. 
        Reference to the BASIC_FACTORY. Deprecated: use LinearAlgebra.UNSAFE_DENSE_FACTORY instead.

      • UNSAFE_COMPRESSED_FACTORY

        @Deprecated
public static final Factory UNSAFE_COMPRESSED_FACTORY
        Deprecated. 
        Reference to the COMPRESSED_FACTORY. Deprecated: use LinearAlgebra.UNSAFE_SPARSE_FACTORY instead.

      • DEFAULT_FACTORY

        @Deprecated
public static final Factory DEFAULT_FACTORY
        Deprecated. 
        The default factory singleton instance. References the BASIC_FACTORY. Deprecated: use LinearAlgebra.DEFAULT_FACTORY instead.

      • DEFAULT_DENSE_FACTORY

        @Deprecated
public static final Factory DEFAULT_DENSE_FACTORY
        Deprecated. 
        The default dense factory singleton instance. References the BASIC_FACTORY. Deprecated: use LinearAlgebra.DENSE_FACTORY instead.

      • DEFAULT_SPARSE_FACTORY

        @Deprecated
public static final Factory DEFAULT_SPARSE_FACTORY
        Deprecated. 
        The default sparse factory singleton instance. References the COMPRESSED_FACTORY. Deprecated: use LinearAlgebra.SPARSE_FACTORY instead.
